channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- nes node module
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- nes node module

item.title: CVE-2017-16025|2024-08-05T20:13:06.662Z -- hackerone -- nes%20node%20module
item.description: Nes is a websocket extension library for hapi. Hapi is a webserver framework. Versions below and including 6.4.0 have a denial of service vulnerability via an invalid Cookie header. This is only present when websocket authentication is set to `cookie`. Submitting an invalid cookie on the websocket upgrade request will cause the node process to error out.
